attributes.action: Remove the change in times for daylight savings
attributes.additional_details: Remove the time change for the outdated ‘daylight savings’ when we all know farmers now have lights on heavy equipment.
attributes.background:
Daylight savings is outdated, which affects us more than we give it credit. Not only does it impact parents, making their children sleep badly but it affects our safety too. 

Now we are heading into winter, it starts to get dark at 4pm. Making our streets that much more unsafe.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/597436
